Description: Bust of Galerius, radiate, draped & cuirassed; right. (obverse)
Emperor standing right, receiving small Victory on globe from Jupiter, leaning on sceptre; left. (reverse)
State: Associated with: Roman Empire Ancient Greece and Rome: Roman Empire
Bibliographic references: RIC6 / The Roman Imperial Coinage, vol. 6: from Diocletian's reform (AD 294) to the death of Maximinus (AD 313) (59b, p.670)
